welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Greeneville! Get ready to immerse yourself in our rich history and southern hospitality. We invite you to explore our quaint town and experience all the unique sights and experiences it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the private terminal offers a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moore-Murrell Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Moore-Murrell Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
